name: Butter Vada Pav
description: Soft pav stuffed with a spicy potato vada, toasted in rich butter for that irresistible street-style flavor.

name: Butter Dabeli
description: A flavorful mix of mashed potatoes, tangy chutneys, and crunchy peanuts sandwiched in buttered pav.

name: Cheese Burger
description: Crispy veggie patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and creamy sauce in a soft toasted bun.
